expo.name: RISE: RPG Alarm Clock - Wake Quests
expo.description: Conquer your morning with RPG alarm challenges! Beat bosses, build streaks, solve puzzles to wake up. Gamified alarm clock with Wake Score, adaptive difficulty, smart wake, morning briefings & social alarms.

aso.subtitle: Gamified Rise Challenges
aso.keywords: alarm,rpg,wake up,gamified,boss battle,streak,morning routine,wake score,smart wake,social alarm,challenge,snooze,fitness,habit,discipline
